P1 - Moves (8-bit)

[Terry]
0x25 and 0x32 = Power Geyser
0x26 ... 0x28 and 0x32 = Triple Geyser

[Andy]
0x3f, 0x40 and 0x7d = Choreppa Dan
0x41 and 0x7d = Zan Ei Reppa

[Joe]
0x52 = Screw Upper
0x55 = Slide Screw

[Mai]
0x64, 0x65 and 0x7d = Super Deadly Ninja Bees
0x68, 0x69 and 0x7d = Leotard Ninja Bees

[Geese]
0x82 = Raging Storm
0x85, 0x86 = Thunderbreaker
0x7d ... 0x7f = Deadly Rave

[Sokaku]
0xbc, 0xbd = Ikazuchi
0xbf = Thundergod Exhalation

[Bob]
0xd0 ... 0xd3 and 0x7d = Dangerous Wolf
0xd4 and 0x7d = Madly Spinning Wolf

[Hon]
0xe5, 0xe6 and 0x7d = Exploding Goro
0xe8, 0xe9 = Candenza Storm

[Mary]
0x09 ... 0x0b = M. Typhoon
0x0f, 0x10 = M. Diving Smasher

[Franco]
0x1d, 0x1e and 0x7d = Final Omega Shot
0x1f and 0x7e = Armageddon Buster (1st part)
0x20 ... 0x24 and 0x7e= Armageddon Buster (2nd part)

[Yamazaki]
 0x34, 0x35 and 0x7e = Guillotine
0x37 ... 0x3c = Driller

[Jin Chonshu]
0x4c, 0x4d = Emperor Rohjin Slash
0x50 = Emperor Doomed Slash

[Jin Chonrei]
0x5b = Emperor Doomed Slash
0x5d = Emperor Ryusei Slash

[Duck]
0x69, 0x6a = Break Spiral
0x6d, 0x6e = Duck Dance
0x6f, 0x70 = Break Hurricane
0x72 = Dancing Caliber
0x73, 0x74 = Rolling Punisher
0x75, 0x76 = Diving Punisher

0x7f ... 0x80 = Phoenix Fandango Kick
0x84, 0x85 = Chinese Phoenix Kick

[Joe]
0x39 and 0x9a = Super Fire Wheel
0x9c, 0x9d, 0x32 and 0x7d = Red Lotus Killer Cudgel

Stage (8-bit)
0x01=Sound Beach
0x02=West Subway
0x03=East Side Park
0x04=Southtown Bridge
0x05=Geese Tower

Alternative Stage - Out of Bounds (8-bit)
0xFF = Right side destroyed

Alternative Stage - Out of Bounds (8-bit)
0xFF = Left side destroyed

Alternative Stage - Left Side (8-bit)
0x00=Rail Trail
0x01=Train
0x01->0x02=Train Moving

Alternative Stage - Right Side (8-bit)
0x00=Rail Trail
0x01=Train
0x01->0x02=Train Moving

Sound Beach - Seafood cafe signboard (Left)
